content: Hello, my research team would like to distribute a survey about rust programmers. We know this community are full of experienced serious rust programmers, so it is a good place to distribute the survey, and we would get a lot of high-quality responses from the community. Which channel allow us to post such advertisements? Can we ask admins to pin our advertisement for a period of time? Thanks!

@sfzhu I think your best bets would be users.rust-lang.org (if you want Rust users), internals.rust-lang.org (if you want Rust developers), and Twitter with cc to @rustlang (to reach a broad swathe of the Rust community).

@Josh Triplett Thanks for your suggestion! I have posted it on users.rust-lang.org. https://users.rust-lang.org/t/paid-online-research-rust-programmers-on-board-programming-experience-and-challenges/56869 We also tried to post it on Twitter, but there were too many bots, and we had to shut down all visits from twitter
